name: Hitm3
storyline:
Help your love Dei make his own movie. Sell empanadas to fund the film or discover the dark origin of your relationship. HITM3 is a third person, slice of life adventure where you control Nam on his days in Santiago de Chile.

Wake up each day with something different to do. Help with the movie or just buy a completo. *Meow* Where did you come from? Share your loneliness with Dei, Astra, Belmo and Terco as your loving relationship is tested by the movie.
summary: Help your love Dei make his own movie. HITM3 is a third person, slice of life adventure where you control Nam on his days in Santiago de Chile.
